MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Dyserth Road, Waen Road and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:45am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10am 14th February 2021
